story:
Overview

Current policies, including the climate of hatred and intolerance they generate, are affecting some of our most vulnerable citizens—including LGBTQ youth—in significant ways. Hidden behind school walls, the harassment and abuse LGBTQ kids experience is often hidden from the rest of us until it's too late.

Policy changes only go so far. What happens in schools is a reflection of a community's values, and changing values requires changing hearts and minds. Therefore, this project also builds in resources such as school-wide and classroom-based presentations, along with topic-related and communication skills training to help educators engage school boards, parents, and community leaders in having the difficult conversations necessary to invoke lasting change.

I'm launching a new project that will augment and expand current safe schools efforts, and will include:

  • A new book for educators on creating safe and inclusive environments for LGBTQ youth
  • An LGBTQ speakers’ bureau that will offer accessible and inclusive compassion-focused programming for educators, students, and communities
  • A pilot multi-disciplinary educational program designed to promote compassion, empathy, and resilience among all students
  • A program to help school libraries purchase LGBTQ-inclusive materials for students and educators

Why Give

Your contribution will make a real difference in the lives of LGBTQ kids, and you'll help make schools safer, better, and more productive for all students. You'll be supporting training for brave, visionary educators who want to transform our schools and communities into more compassionate spaces for us all.

Your support will help:

  • Empower educators who are trying to help create safe spaces for LGBTQ students
  • Provide educators and students with access to LGBTQ-positive/inclusive resources
  • Support educators and parents who are trying to advocate for change in school policies to support LGBTQ students
  • Engage communities in non-violent communication around issues of LGBTQ inclusiveness and visibility
  • Provide programming focused on compassion, empathy, and resilience to under-resourced or otherwise challenged schools/districts
  • Show LGBTQ students across the country that they are seen, and they matter

Background

According to researchers from GLSEN (Gay, Lesbian, Straight Education Network), “Schools nationwide are hostile environments for a distressing number of LGBTQ students, the overwhelming majority of whom routinely hear anti-LGBT language and experience vicitimization and discrimination at school.”

Data from GLSEN’s latest “National School Climate Survey” (which contains data from a sample of 10,528 students across the country), shows just how significant and pervasive challenges are at school for LGBTQ youth. 

•    85.2% of students experienced verbal harassment
•    98.1% of students heard “gay” used in a negative way at school
•    95.8% of students heard other homophobic remarks, such as “dyke” or “faggot”
•    85.7% of students heard negative remarks specifically about transgender people
•    57.6% of students felt unsafe at school because of their sexual orientation
•    71.5% avoided school functions and 65.7% avoided extracurricular activities because they felt unsafe of uncomfortable
•    31.8% of students missed at least one entire day of school in the past month because they felt unsafe or uncomfortable
•    48.6% of students experienced cyberbullying 
•    59.6% of students were sexually harassed
•    27% of students were physically harassed
•    13% of students were physically assaulted 

And this behavior is in many cases supported, either overtly or implicitly, by school staff and policies: 

•    56.2% of students reported hearing homophobic remarks from their teachers or other school staff; 63.5% reported hearing negative remarks about gender expression from teachers or other school staff
•    81.6% of students reported that their school engaged in LGBT-related discriminatory policies or practices
•    57.6% of students who were harassed or assaulted at school did not report the incident to school staff, most often because they doubted that effective intervention would occur, or that the situation would become worse
•    63.5% of students who did report an incident said school staff did nothing in response, or told the student to ignore it.

About the Project Coordinator

Kelly Madrone is a communication consultant, author, and speaker. She has published two award-winning self-help books for teens, one of which—GLBTQ: The Survival Guide for Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender, and Questioning Teens—is about to be in its third edition and which is a Social Justice Book List selection by the National Network of State Teachers of the Year. Kelly has also worked for the Metropolitan Washington, D.C., chapter of PFLAG where she helped provide support and educational services to LGBTQ people and their families. Her honors include the New York Public Library’s “Voice of Youth Advocates” award. Kelly has a degree in secondary English education with a concentration in psychology. To learn more about Kelly, her work, and what her clients and students say about her, visit www.kellymadrone.com.

Author of the book foreword: Louis N. Wool, Ed.D., superintendent, Harrison Central School District, New York; 2010 New York State School Superintendent of the Year

Get Involved

If you're a teacher, administrator, librarian, school counselor, parent, or community member and you'd like to join me in this movement or have me come to your school, please contact me via my website: www.kellymadrone.com/contact. I'd love to hear from you!

story:
What I'm Here For:

Hi, I'm Brad Blackwell, and I have been writing short horror for about two years now. I mostly write for The Children of Samhain...

... or Reddit's NoSleep...

But now I want to take my stories and bring them to a different type of media. PHYSICAL FORM!!

And that's why I'm here, to try and raise money to help get my collection of short stories that I've decided to call Living Nightmares, published and available to everyone. 

What You're Here For:

I am going to be using a print-on-demand service to make the book available, which helps costs but still isn't cheap. The $500 that this campaign is trying to raise will be going to designing the interior, purchasing ISBNs, and paying my cover artist,

Alejandro Rodriguez. Any extra funds will go to helping make to book even nicer, creating and distributing advertisements, and maybe even some bonus perks along the way. 

(Psst. Down here! Speaking of perks, if you let your eyes wander over to the right, you'll see that there's already a cool pool of perks to be able to snatch up with contributions.)


If You Can't Contribute Funds:

That's okay! There's still other ways that you can help Living Nightmares come to life, like:

  • Share the campaign page on your book of faces or that site with all the birds tweeting. 
  • Contact me if you have any ideas that might help the campaign reach a wider audience. 
  • Do that tree thing where you tell people and then they tell people, and then tell a uh... a tree? Something like that.

story:
Brief Summary 

I've been accepted as a Fellow at Lambda's Writers' Retreat in L.A., this June. It's going to be a life-changing experience; with the support of amazing teachers and a cohort of strong LGBTQ writers, it will kick my own fiction-writing into a new gear. There isn't another writing program like this currently; however, I need to be able to raise funds for the remaining costs of the retreat, and to pay for travel costs from London. Any contribution you make will get me closer to that goal, and will be greatly appreciated!

More info on the retreat can be found here, on Lambda Literary's website.


What I Need

£300 will pay the rest of my costs for the retreat itself... and another £500 or so will pay for the flight. Time is key though - prices go up the later I book!

The Impact

I'm transitioning from mainly writing spoken word poetry to taking my fiction writing much more seriously. Being a Writers' Retreat Fellow will be a huge step in this process, helping to develop my short stories and make connections with other LGBT writers. Justin Torres will be leading the fiction workshop, and here are some of the other fellows this year... it's basically going to be a stellar group! Once it's over, I'll be returning to London with a handful of stories, which will go towards my much bigger dream of publishing my first novel.  


Risks & Challenges

I will book the flights by early May and I have to pay the retreat fees later in the month. Timing is tight and I need to be able to raise this money quite quickly! Having your support is the only way I'm going to be able to go. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot afford to contribute, please share this link and spread the word!

story:
Welcome to Poems from a Tree's Confession.

My name is Max and I've been writing poems and songs since I've been 12 years old. 

Poems from a Tree’s Confession is a collection of my writings, past and present, my goal here is to publish my writings and be able to start on my second book.  


I've worked in the steel industry for most of my working years with many ups and downs, but I was never was happy where I was in life. I've always turned to writing for everything, from happy to sad times I used my pen and paper to express myself.

This is how I find true bliss; please help me with the next step in my life.

story:
Hello out there!

My name is Stephanie Eberl and I work and play as a make-up artist in Boulder, Colorado. Iv'e been writing since a child and only until recently have I taken it up seriously.

I have started this campaign to raise some of the money that is required to publish a book, and this is just a small portion that would take care of editing costs and online publishing. This book is my life's work. I started writing it four years ago and not until this year did I realize what it was all about!

Not only will your contribution help me achieve one of the most important of my life's accomplishments thus far, but you will also help support the message that my memoir and my soul wants to bring into the world!

WHAT I NEED

In order to publish online, I need a professional editor to go through my manuscript from start to finish, correcting any details or errors that will be required from a publishing house later. I am self-publishing for now, and if everything goes well, I will have gotten an agent or publisher interested in my work.

Once I have covered the costs with your help, you will have the opportunity to read my book on your computer screen through create space, and later when my book gets published, I will give you a signed copy to enjoy! 

THE IMPACT

I feel that my story is important to myself and the world because it is who I really am and have the opportunity to express freely with passion and without reservations. I believe that our stories can transform and bond not only our own lives but other's too, when sharing our tales and life lessons with one another.  

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Even five dollars helps! I will not turn down anything, of course no contribution is too small!

Let your friends and family know, word of mouth and recommendations  all trickle down!

Thank you so much for your precious time and support!

story:
Read in English


A Trip with Ira

A Trip with Ira es un proyecto audiovisual que surge con el propósito de fomentar el voluntariado entre la gente joven sin tener que pasar por las grandes empresas de "voluntariado" que se lucran de la gente que quiere ayudar. Un vídeo semanal que muestre las ongs, talleres y grupos de trabajo que encontremos por el camino. La ruta la ponéis vosotros, los espectadores sugiriendo sitios que visitar, cosas que hacer, gente que conocer y en definitiva qué os gustaría que pasara en el viaje para solventar todas las dudas sobre voluntariado que tengáis y ayudaros a dar ese gran paso.
Se trata también de un proyecto con el cuál mostraremos los pros y contras de viajar con un perro, investigaremos en cada país a qué lugares podemos entrar y a cuáles no y qué problemas hemos tenido con respecto a ello. 


Características básicas

Grabaremos y editaremos un vídeo semanal de unos 20 minutos ofreciendo destinos de voluntariado empezando en Madrid y viajando hacia el este mientras nos lleguen los fondos, los usuarios podrán sugerir lugares para visitar, organizar encuentros para compartir la experiencia con otra gente y contactar con nosotros a través de las redes sociales para solventar cualquier tipo de duda sobre el proyecto, conocernos etc. Contactaremos por nuestra cuenta con todas las organizaciones que podamos y que nos parezcan atractivas para compartir, así como compartir lo que aprendamos de unas en otras.


Motivación y a quién va dirigido el proyecto

Nos conocimos (Mariana y Juan) de voluntariado en Kenia hace unos años y siempre hemos tenido una fuerte motivación y muchas ganas de compartir la experiencia del voluntariado a la gente joven y no tan joven que aún no la ha probado. También somos voluntarios en Madrid con amigosdelosmayores pero queremos conocer más y acercar ese conocimiento a todos, para que crezca y evolucione. 

Va dirigida a ti, que lees esto, a todo aquel que haya tenido la idea alguna vez de viajar lejos y ayudar a alguien, a la gente que no está conforme cuando ve injusticias y siente que si todos hacemos un poco podemos cambiar mucho.


Objetivos de la campaña de crowdfunding

Con esta campaña pretendemos financiar el viaje ya que nos hemos gastado todos nuestros ahorros en la furgoneta (una vieja t3 del '86) y en su acondicionamiento. Mientras más fondos consigamos más lejos podremos ir y acercaros a más sitios. 


Fundamentalmente, necesitaremos dinero para comida (tanto para nosotros como para Ira), bebida, gasolina, visados, y todos los gastos que nos encontremos, prometo economizar y gastar lo  menos posible.


Experiencia previa y equipo

Mariana es licenciada en Historia del Arte y tiene un master en dirección de documentales y un ciclo superior de Imagen (fotografía y video), ella se encargará de toda la parte técnica, de que se vea y oiga todo bien y de tomar mucho material gráfico para compartirlo con todos.

Juan es un desarrollador de software en una cooperativa (devtopia.coop) y se encargará de la parte de la web, redes sociales, mapas interactivos y comunicaciones online.

Ira es la perra de Juan, acogida de la asociación Alba (albaonline.org) tras haber sido abandonada de cachorra junto con su hermana, ¡se viene con nosotros!

¡Leer en Español!


A Trip with Ira

A Trip with Ira is an audiovisual project that comes with the purpose of promoting
volunteerism among young people without having to go through the big companies who profit from people who want to volunteer. A weekly video showing the NGOs, workshops and workgroups we find along the way. The route's up to you, the viewers suggesting places to visit, things to do, people to meet and ultimately what you'd like to see happen.

It is also a project to show what are the pros and cons of traveling with a dog, in each country we'll investigate which places we can go to and the problems we have to solve


Basic features

We will record and edit a weekly video featuring 20 minutes of volunteering destinations starting in Madrid and traveling east as long as we have funds, users can suggest places to visit, organise meetings to share the experience with others and contact us through social networks to resolve any doubts about the project, etc. We will contact organisations too and share the ones that look good, and share the knowledge between those organisations.


How did the project start

We met (Mariana and Juan) Volunteering in Kenya a few years ago and have always had a strong motivation and desire to share the experience of volunteerism. We are volunteers in  Madrid with an NGo called amigosdelosmayores but we want to know more and bring that knowledge to all, so that it grows and evolves. 


Aims of the crowdfunding campaign

With this campaign we intend to finance the trip since we have spent all our savings in the van (an old t3 '86) and its repairs. The more money we get the further we'll go and  the more places we'll bring closer to you.

Mainly, we need money for food (both for us and Ira), drink, petrol, visas, and other expenses associated with the journey, I promise to spend as little as possible  on our need. 


Previous experience and equipment

Mariana has a degree in art history and a master in documentary filmmaking and higher degree in image (photo and video), she will handle all the technical part, making sure it all looks good, it's heard clearly and to share lots of photos with you

John is a software developer in a cooperative (devtopia.coop) and be responsible for part of the web, social media, interactive maps and online communications.

Ira is Juan's dog, adopted from Alba (albaonline.org) association after being abandoned puppy along with her sister, she's coming with us!

story:
A timeless story for Children of All Ages

THE SETTING

"Just outside of a town near you,
A pond ripples softly with waters of blue.
Over the waters there’s always a breeze
That bends and sways the strongest of reeds."

RAFF 

"All the pond knew, he was the weakest of reeds.
He could barely withstand a ladybug’s sneeze.
He cowered so low and bowed down his head.
And wished he could be a strong reed, instead."

"Raff’s feebleness wasn’t embarrassing only
It also made Raff the Reed rather lonely.
No butterfly ever sat down on poor Raff.
The very idea made the butterflies laugh."

BITSY

"Then one day a strange new butterfly appeared.
She flew in odd circles and that just seemed weird."

"The others went on with their laughing and talk,
But Raff watched as Bitsy sat down on a rock.
Bitsy sat on the rock, and down it did sink!
Deep down in the mud!  What was Raff to think?
How could itsy Bitsy weigh that heavy rock down?
She couldn’t weigh more than one gazillionth of a pound!"

WHAT HAPPENS NEXT? 

I'll give you a hint:  It's SOMETHING WONDERFUL!  And it opens the door to a whole SERIES of adventures in the pond and beyond.

REASONS TO DONATE

The tale of Bitsy and Raff celebrates the power of friendship and the

importance of inclusion in our increasingly complicated world.  When a child is 

encouraged to befriend others in spite of-- or better yet, IN APPRECIATION of-- 

differences, the whole community wins.  The  ensuing series of books will take Bitsy 

and Raff on further adventures, which will inspire, enlighten, or sometimes simply 

ENTERTAIN!

Your contribution will be used directly for: (in addition to Scott Cohen's fanciful...er... suggestions in our campaign video.)

  • Creating the illustrations for our first book.  The exquisite detail and layers of watercolor take a lot of time!
  • Professional design of the book and cover.  We estimate 32 pages.
  • Printing of the first edition.  You'll get a copy if you donate $50 or more!
  • Printing of an e-book version. We'll send you that, too!
  • Printing of T-shirts and Posters.  You'll also get these, depending on your contribution level!
  • Marketing of the book to reach the widest audience.

A portion of proceeds will be donated to:

PFLAG (Parents and Friends of Lesbians and Gays)  www.pflag.org  


PERKS

Any donation of $25 or above buys a Bitsy and Raff desktop wallpaper image, and a first edition e book.  $50 or above buys at least one first edition copy of the printed book.  At some levels you will also receive:

  • signed original illustrations!
  • lunch with the creators or with the handsome and talented Scott Cohen!
  • a visit by the creators to your school or community center!
  • adorable, hand-crafted BITSY dolls!

SPREAD THE WORD! 

  • Share our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, etc.
  • Remember you can use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Kampanja je uspešno završena! 

Knjige i dalje možete naručiti ovde, klikom na željeni perk, i platiti ih karticom ili preko svog PayPal naloga. Za naručioce iz Srbije i one koji bi da lično preuzmu knjige u Beogradu, kontakt osoba je Dalibor: daliborkokic@gmail.com.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Zdravo svima,

Moje ime je Snežana Radojičić, i ja sam pisac i putnik oko sveta na biciklu.

Od 2011. kotrljam se oko ove naše lepe planete bez ikakvog plana o povratku. Putujem sa vrlo skormnim sredstvima i zbog toga uglavnom kampujem.  Tako sam za četiri godine sabrala preko 1 000 noći pod otvorenim nebom.

Kampovala sam na mnogim nezaboravnim mestima. Ali i na nekim prilično neobičnim: na 'poljima smrti' u severnoj Kambodži, u dvorištima policijskih stanica u Tajlandu, u džunglama Burme, u kozjem toru u Gobi pustinji... Gledala sam najlepše izlaske i zalaske Sunca, i preživela najrazličitije vremenske nepogode: grad veličine oraha koji mi je polomio konstrukciju šatora, monsunske pljuskove nakon kojih sam plutala na podlozi, pustinjske oluje kada sam bila zatrpana slojem peska, snegove i snežne oluje... 

A kada sam krenula u ovu avanturu, nisam znala skoro ništa. Moje iskustvo u kampovanju sastojalo se od dve-tri godine vikend-planinarenja, u grupi i uglavnom po lepom vremenu. A moja najduža tura biciklom bila je šest dana po Srbiji.

Srećom, moj prvi saputnik bio je prekaljeni kamper i cikloputnik. Prvo sam učila od njega, a kasnije i od drugih kampera i putnika koje sam sretala uživo ili na internet forumima, a najviše na sopstvenim greškama.

Sada imam veliko iskustvo. I želim da svoje znanje podelim sa svima vama. Zbog toga sam napisala dva priručnika:

Kamperski priručnik sa mini-kuvarom i Vodič za putovanja biciklom


Knjige su namenjene svima koji bi da se upuste u avanturu a ne znaju odakle da počnu sa pripremama ili ne znaju dovoljno o svemu što bi trebalo i što ih može zadesiti na kampovanju i/li ciklo-putovanju. Zajedno čine celinu ali mogu se čitati i potpuno odvojeno.

Da bi bile što bolje, doprineli su i recezenti. 

Recezent Kamperskog priručnika sa mini-kuvarom je Vanja Ćirić - ljubitelj prirode, istrazivač, trener polarnih pasa za vuču, alpinista-pripravnik, speleolog, menadžer u prodavnici outdoor opreme. Ili jednostavno - outdoor man.

Recezent Vodiča za putovanja biciklom je Aleksandar Veljković -  jedan od pionira cikloturizma kod nas, pasionirani ljubitelj prirode, nomad, geograf i topograf... rečju - overlender, koji putuje koristeći različite vrste i broj točkova, kao i bez točkova, 




ŠTA SE NALAZI U OVIM KNJIGAMA?

U prvom delu obe knjige nalaze se tehničke informacije o opremi za kampovanje, odnosno opremi za putovanje biciklom. U drugom delu su praktični saveti kada se već nalazite na kampovanju ili kada ste već na putovanju.


Neka od poglavlja Kamperskog priručnika sa mini-kuvarom su:

    • Kako da izaberete odgovarajući šator
    • Koja podloga vam treba
    • Perjana ili sintetička vreća?
    • U čemu se razlikuju pojedini gorionici, kako rade i za koje situacije su najfunkcionalniji
    • Šta obavezno treba da ponesete na svako kampovanje (check-liste)
    • Kako da se zaštite od opasnosti i nepogoda
    • Kako da se izborite sa strahovima
    • Kako da zakrpite probušenu podlogu ili pocepan šator
    • Kako da se okupate kada je hladno ili sa nedovoljno vode
    • Šta da kuvate osim paste i pirinča


Glavna poglavlja u Vodiču za putovanje biciklom su:

  • Kako da odaberete bicikl shodno svom budžetu
  • Koje bisage da nabavite ili kako da ih sami napravite ili da improvizujete
  • Šta od opreme morate da imate, a šta je poželjno mada ne i neophodno
  • Kako da se što bolje spakujete
  • Kako da se snađete kad ne znate jezik ili se izgubite
  • Kako da planirate rutu i dnevnu kilometražu
  • Gde i kako da se hranite
  • Gde i kako da nađete saputnike
  • Gde sve možete da spavate jeftino ili besplatno ako ne kampujete
  • Koliko (može da) košta putovanje biciklom
  • Šta treba da znate ako ste devojka/žena koja putuje sama



Oba priručnika spremna su za štampanje. Ali, da bi zaista ugledali svetlost dana, potrebna su sredstva koja ja nemam. Jedini načini da ih obezbedim su: pretprodaja i mikrofinansiranje. Vaše je da izaberete.



ŠTA SVE MOŽETE DA DOBIJETE?

  • Knjigu ili obe knjige po nižoj ceni od kasnije prodajne.
  • Elektronsku verziju putopisa ‘Himalaji biciklom’ o mom usponu na najviši vrh Anapurne - Torung La (5 614 mnv), sa preko trideset fotografija. 
  • Mesto u Mini-kuvaru u Kamperskom priručniku za vaš omiljeni recept, sa vašim imenom u potpisu.
  • Prostor na pola stranice u jednom od priručnika da ispričate anegdotu sa svog kampovanja ili putovanja biciklom, svoje iskustvo, savet ili razmišljanje o kampovanju i bicikliranju... 
  • Priliku da objavite svoju najbolju fotografiju (ili više njih) sa kampovanja ili putovanja biciklom, uz propratni tekst koji na trećini stranice objašnjava sliku. 

I još toga...



KAKO MOŽETE DA UČESTVUJETE?

Vrlo je jednostavno: sa desne strane, pored ovog teksta, pronađite nešto što vam odgovara. Kliknite i sledite uputstva za sigurno plaćanje kreditnom/debitnom karticom ili preko PayPal naloga.

Ako nemate karticu ili PayPal pošaljite mi poruku na mejl koji je naveden na kraju ovog teksta i dobićete sve instrukcije za dinarsku uplatu u banci/pošti ili za elektronsku uplatu.

Knjige izlaze u prvoj polovini juna i odmah po izlasku dobijate je/ih na svoju adresu.



OČEKIVANI TROŠKOVI:

Ako imate neka pitanja, slobodno me kontaktirajte na: kbkampanja@gmail.com

      koje situacije su najfunkcionalniji
Šta obavezno treba da ponesete na svako kampovanje
      (check-liste)
Kako da se zaštite od opasnosti i nepogoda
Kako da se izborite sa strahovima
Kako da zakrpite probušenu podlogu ili pocepan šator
Kako da se okupate kada je hladno ili sa nedovoljno
      vode
Šta da kuvate osim paste i pirinča

Glavna poglavlja u Vodiču za putovanje biciklom su:
Kako da odaberete bicikl shodno svom budžetu
Koje bisage da nabavite ili kako da ih sami napravite ili da improvizujete
Šta od opreme morate da imate, a šta je poželjno mada ne i neophodno
Kako da se što bolje spakujete
Kako da se snađete kad ne znate jezik ili se izgubite
Kako da planirate rutu i dnevnu kilometražu
Gde i kako da se hranite
Gde i kako da nađete saputnike
Gde sve možete da spavate jeftino ili besplatno ako ne kampujete
Koliko (može da) košta putovanje biciklom
Šta treba da znate ako ste devojka/žena koja putuje sama

Oba priručnika spremna su za štampanje. Ali, da bi zaista
ugledali svetlost dana, potrebna su sredstva koja ja nemam. Jedini načini da ih
obezbedim su: pretprodaja i mikrofinansiranje. Vaše je da izaberete.
ŠTA SVE MOŽETE DA
DOBIJETE?

Knjigu ili obe knjige po nižoj ceni od kasnije
     prodajne.

Elektronsku verziju putopisa ‘Himalaji biciklom’ o mom
     usponu na najviši vrh Anapurne - Torung La (5 614 mnv), sa preko trideset
     fotografija. 


Mesto u Mini-kuvaru u Kamperskom priručniku za vaš
     omiljeni recept, sa vašim imenom u potpisu.
Prostor na pola stranice u jednom od priručnika da
     ispričate anegdotu sa svog kampovanja ili putovanja biciklom, svoje
     iskustvo, savet ili razmišljanje o kampovanju i bicikliranju... 

Priliku da objavite svoju najbolju fotografiju (ili
     više njih) sa kampovanja ili putovanja biciklom, uz propratni tekst koji
     na trećini stranice objašnjava sliku. 

I još toga...
KAKO MOŽETE DA UČESTVUJETE?Vrlo je jednostavno: sa desne strane, pored ovog teksta,
pronađite nešto što vam odgovara. Kliknite i sledite uputstva za sigurno
plaćanje kreditnom/debitnom karticom ili preko PayPal naloga. Ako nemate karticu ili PayPal pošaljite mi poruku na mejl koji je naveden na kraju ovog teksta i dobićete sve instrukcije za dinarsku uplatu u banci/pošti ili za elektronsku uplatu.
Knjige izlaze u prvoj polovini juna i odmah po izlasku
dobijate je/ih na svoju adresu.
OČEKIVANI TROŠKOVI:
Ako imate neka pitanja, slobodno me kontaktirajte na:
kbkampanja@gmail.com

story:
Welcome

Hi! Thanks for looking at our “Expose my wife’s Writing Super Powers” (the Dead Awakenings novel) funding campaign!

My goal is to expose my wife’s Writing Super Powers by self-publishing her novel DEAD AWAKENINGS.

Remember to check our UPDATES for the latest news!

James Ganiere here. My wife, Rebekah is one of the most talented people that I know. Like all SUPER HEROES she has a WEAKNESS. She has NO idea how AMAZING she is. She has forgotten her true identity (or has never discovered it) and believes her secret identity is real, house wife, mother, and home school teacher of 4 children, who are far more interesting than she is. She is her own Kryptonite and as such will always stay in the shadows unless revealed. Help me in my campaign to shine the light on her WRITING SUPER POWERS. Help me EXPOSE her true writing powers to the WORLD.

We have a great novel we’re dying to release. Check out the rewards that the Fantasy & Sci-Fi in all of us would love.

Fans who contribute to DEAD AWAKENINGS’s IndieGoGo campaign are eligible to receive exclusive rewards in exchange for individual pledges ranging from $5 to $5,000. Also Fractured Atlas who is handling the transactions is offering a partial TAX DEDUCTION as a perk, so the more you CONTRIBUTE the more you SAVE.

How cool is that?

Learn The DEAD AWAKENINGS Story!

Devour the novel DEAD AWAKENINGS that reinvents the classic ZOMBIE genre as writer Rebekah R. Ganiere takes you to a whole other world of Fantasy and Romance.

DEAD AWAKENINGS is a new and original novel kicking off a series written, illustrated, marketed, published, and distributed by some of the top up-and-coming Fantasy and Science-Fiction visionaries today. (My wife and Me of course! And we can’t forget the kids, they are a sources of great inspiration and major influence in our lives. We are EXCITED to add YOU to the team! Join the HORDE!)

Summary

When Evaine Michaels wakes strapped to a rusty hospital bed, with no memory of who she is, she knows she's in trouble. But things are only going to get worse for Evaine.

Unable to control her new emotional or physical appetites Evaine is torn between unending hunger and unfathomable rages. But it's the undeniably attraction to the beautiful and elusive Luca that has her in even worse shape.

Luca is a Greek god of a man who wants nothing to do with newborn zombie Evaine, but hard as he tries, neither of them can deny the electric connection when they touch. Or why it is that they can feel each others emotions.

What will happen when Evaine finally remembers who she was, and finds out that her high school sweetheart hasn't give up on finding her. Tristan a millionaire playboy will stop at nothing to get Evaine back, but the journey may lead him to finding out things, that were better left unknown.

As Evaine, Luca and even Tristan try to discover who is experimenting on humans and why, Evaine is forced to choose between the man who makes her feel safe, and the man who's touch ignites her soul.

 

Our Goal is $8500 will cover:

  • Editor      to proof the novel which is 130,000 words. (This is the biggest expense.)
  • Illustrator      for the Cover (Specialized)
  • Paperback      Copies

 

And yes if we fall short of our goal it will take longer to publish and out Rebekah’s super powers, so TELL your friends!

We can publish the book faster, better and more efficient with your help.

If we exceed our Goal of $8500

  • Additional Paperback Copies (Of Course!)
  • Hard Back Copies and Archival Leather Copies
  • Next Book in the Series

How Can You Help?

  • Contribute $ money and get great rewards
  • Spread the word
    • Tell all your friends! Indiegogo share tools
    • Post links – Facebook / Twitter/ Blogs /
    • Tell anyone  you know in media
  • Become a Beta Reader
    • Get to read the Novel before the release.
    • Tell us you Favorite parts. And what you’d love to see in the sequel next book. (Keep them in the book!)
    • Ask the author questions.
  • Contribute Skills/Resources
    • Fan Art
    • Fan Trailer
    • Concept Art
    • Printing Press
    • Floor & Counter Space in your Store
    • Distribution & PR

 

Our Team

Rebekah Ganiere

Rebekah Ganiere has always loved Fantasy and Sci-fi.  As a child she loved comic books and Star Wars.  Those loves developed into a teenage love of Fantasy and role playing games.  As an adult she found Romance to be a big influence in her life, leading her to begin writing Paranormal and Fantasy Romance books.  Rebekah has currently written three novels and has two more she is finishing.  A myriad of book outlines await in the wings for their turns to be written.  Rebekah lives in the Santa Clarita Valley with her four children, husband, dog, two rabbits, a lizard, a tortoise and an escape snake. (No Joke! We still have not found it.)

James Ganiere

James Ganiere here from Rio Vista Universal. As a kid I loved STORIES. I couldn’t get enough of them. I bought my first TV when I was 8 years old, so I didn’t have to compete for the almighty REMOTE. And I definitely spent every moment I could at the movies. At night my father told me stories of his adventures around the world, before I feel asleep listening to old time radio show serials. It wasn’t till later that I move from comic books to devouring books. The Fantasy & Science-Fiction genres were the best ones. When it came time for to pick a degree and college there was ONLY 1 choice for me, USC - School of Cinematic Arts, the place where stories become REAL! Deciding to leave the industry to start a family was bitter sweet. I easily transferred my skills of running a set and solving problems as an Assistant Director to overhauling business for 10 years. Then my kids wanted to start acting, which Green Lit my return. More recently I founded an educational non-profit corporation See Me Learn to teach kids arts and sciences after school.

Brittany, Brianna

Angelina, Christian

Rewards

·         $5     FORGOTTEN ZOMBIE

Downloadable *Chapter 1 of the novel DEAD AWAKENINGS. Downloadable bottle label for Zombie Brain fluid. (Paste it on bottles for awesome HALLOWEEN props.)

*WARNING-This product has been know to cause addiction and may result in you becoming a Beta Reader.

·         $17     NEWBORN ZOMBIE

Downloadable Amazon Kindle edition of the novel Dead Awakenings. + All of the Above Rewards

·         $33     EVOLVED ZOMBIE

Signed paper back edition of the novel Dead Awakenings (Free Shipping in the U.S. Please add an additional $10 for international shipping) + FORGOTTEN ZOMBIE Reward

·         $50     ENHANCED ZOMBIE

Signed paper back edition of the novel Dead Awakenings (Free Shipping in the U.S. Please add an additional $10 for international shipping) + All of the Above Rewards

Become a Dead Awakenings BETA READER!

·         $107     MEDICAL TRIAL STAFF

Special Downloadable Beta Reader edition of the novel Dead Awakenings before the book is published and available to the public. Special Acknowledgement listing YOU as a Beta Reader in the published book. + All of the Above

All shipping to lower 48 US States included! Additional $10 to everywhere else.

 

Dead Awakenings Already Praised By Hollywood Production Companies for Reinventing the Genre!

Ok! So in my quest to reveal Rebekah’s writing super powers I convinced her to let me take her story and pitch it to over 20-30 HOLLYWOOD Production companies. They LOVED the story, but suggested the pitch and logline of:

Evaine, a strong, independent, young woman, refuses to accept help from her trust-fund, high school, sweet heart Tristan and enters an unsanctioned clinical drug trial for money, with no knowledge of the horrible side effects of amnesia, super powers and death that awaits. However, these are not your typical super powers. Will Evaine develop super powers and will she use her powers for good or will they destroy her?

Even the production companies like Alcon Entertainment (The Blind Side) that don’t produce Fantasy or Sci-Fi had incredible reviews. The number one thing they all praised was that it REINVENTED the ZOMBIE Genre making it FRESH and NEW.

They were also EXCITED to see the book published. When I asked if it made a difference where it was published, Anonymous Content said, “Now days, it doesn’t matter whither it is self-published or through a traditional publisher.” However there seem to be a preference by some with self-published (branded or not). And a special thanks to Zac Sanford at Suntaur/Elsboy Entertainment for your help!

 

I really love this story Dead Awakenings.

I know some… Ok most, would say that I’m bias, since Rebekah is my wife, but she’ll be the first to tell you I don’t pull punches well.

And of course there are the Beta Readers that have become addicted, feeding them one chapter at a time. 

Cruel, I know. But you have to be sure they REALLY want to read the next chapter.

You always hear, “Don’t judge a book by its cover.” But we do and I so often do my self. Many times it’s how I decide what book to pick up in the store to read more. And the same applies even more so online.

You can help us with making sure this book gets the cover it deserves, so that those searching, through the sea of books, for that gem, which ignite our imagination the same way our favorites do, will pick it up.

I used to wonder “Why are there not more good fantasy books?” Why do so many of the Vampires, Werewolves & Zombies books fall short?

Most of us would pay double and triple the price, for a book with a GREAT story.

If you love Fantasy and Science Fiction novels with some Romance this is your CHANCE to bring one to LIFE.

Thanks for making this happen!

Remember to check our UPDATES page for the latest news!

It's the tab at the top.

story:
Vitreous Hide

Help us bring Michael Tod Edgerton's remarkable first book of poetry into the world with a bang. You would want to buy the book anyway, so why not contribute slightly more and help with the production?
 

Book Description:

Willing the word to become flesh, the poems in Vitreous Hide both reveal and enact yearning—for love, for the beloved, for the words to transform beloved image to beloved substance. Orpheus reaches for Narcissus through a new mirror of myth, now dim with distance, now bright with the possibility of connection. Through the shining skin or surface of prose lines and field composition, these poems reach for the embodiment of the other in order to be, themselves, embodied.

 

Advance praise for Vitreous Hide:

In a theater of the page permeated by sonic play, Edgerton shuffles together elements and impressions of the Orpheus myth, splicing them together with other aspects of the Greek pantheon, augmented with cameo appearances by Cocteau, Heidegger, Madame Bovary, and a few essential others. True to the Orphic agenda, sound, made overtly and gorgeously lyric, becomes the dominant character, increasingly swept up into a dynamically choreographed typography. It’s a book of big ideas and big feeling, yet carried so lightly on its lyric weave that it becomes almost weightless. A real delight for both ear and mind.

                                                                                                                        - Cole Swensen

 

Edgerton is brilliant to announce that myth and the perils of myth are flesh of our flesh, the perdurable instance of our human birth. Vitreous Hide details the dream of that birth and all the loves that keep the dream alive. These poems are the very soul of tenderness.

                                                                                                                         - Donald Revell

 

Others will speak of Edgerton’s brilliant use of forms and the dense musical structure that animates the poems of Vitreous Hide, and still others will be clucking their heads at the strange title, which reconstitutes in sound the brutal and the breathy, the upper and lower limits of his speech.  But I want to put in a word for the gay erotics of this work, which seem to me to have no equivalent in modern American poetry.  Really you’d have to go back in time and cross many seas, you’d have to flutter into Cavafy’s bedroom on a warm summer night, in that room above the cafe, the dark room with the many lighted candles, to hear so persuasive, alert, and stunning a love poem.

                                                                                                                             - Kevin Killian

From Vitreous Hide:

Dispossessed of the whole     the word     of the whorl

of the light, the light          of the wet foliage

phosphorescing noon eyes          shower

 

the ground, saturated with falling, petals

your feet, irises          in wet dirt

 

r o o t          s t e m          s t y l e          s t i g m a

 

narcissi soiling the water with aspiration          reflection                   

you take for thirst

 

what slakes of you          the whorling unworlding, the lack of

sift through soft-spoken, even callused hands

 

of the hands and what they do

not say:          lines          veins          hairs          marks

 

of the hands and what they only say      

between the lines:          their caress

 

of the dirt: of the sky: of the feet: of the waves of

sun blears          chromatic

 

edges that compose the garden          burst

of rabbit overtaken into the thickness                   

 

(its empty errant secret)

 

          (thickening)

flies          thicken

 

an exposed turtle eye                   

wide as any moment          of  (shuttering)

 

Tongue I gave you          (saying)

I is the truth you ease          with release

 

Originally published in Denver Quarterly. 

Other poems in the book have been published as the winner of the Boston Review and Five Fingers Review poetry contests, and in such publications as Eoagh, New American Writing, and Word For/Word.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, we understand. Help us, though, by spreading the word to your friends, sharing on Facebook, etc.
 
If you run a reading series, please consider inviting Tod. He'd probably love to read for you and yours. Contact him here or through the Vitreous Hide Facebook page.
 
Consider reviewing Vitreous Hide. Please contact Lavender Ink for review copies.
 
Please also consider adopting the book for your creative writing, poetics, forms and craft or literature course. Vitreous Hide provides a great entry point into productive discussions of queer poetry and poetics, field composition and formal experimentation, "postmodern" poetry and poetics, and modes of the contemporary lyric.

                                                                                                                         - Donald Revell
 
Others will speak of Edgerton’s brilliant use of forms and the dense musical structure that animates the poems of Vitreous Hide, and still others will be clucking their heads at the strange title, which reconstitutes in sound the brutal and the breathy, the upper and lower limits of his speech.  But I want to put in a word for the gay erotics of this work, which seem to me to have no equivalent in modern American poetry.  Really you’d have to go back in time and cross many seas, you’d have to flutter into Cavafy’s bedroom on a warm summer night, in that room above the cafe, the dark room with the many lighted candles, to hear so persuasive, alert, and stunning a love poem.
                                                                                                                             - Kevin Killian

From Vitreous Hide:
Dispossessed of the whole     the word     of the whorl 
of the light, the light          of the wet foliage
phosphorescing noon eyes          shower
 
the ground, saturated with falling, petals
your feet, irises          in wet dirt
 
r o o t          s t e m          s t y l e          s t i g m a
 
narcissi soiling the water with aspiration          reflection                   
you take for thirst
 
what slakes of you          the whorling unworlding, the lack of
sift through soft-spoken, even callused hands
 
of the hands and what they do
not say:          lines          veins          hairs          marks
 
of the hands and what they only say      
between the lines:          their caress
 
of the dirt: of the sky: of the feet: of the waves of
sun blears          chromatic
 
edges that compose the garden          burst
of rabbit overtaken into the thickness                   
 
(its empty errant secret)
 
          (thickening)
flies          thicken
 
an exposed turtle eye                   
wide as any moment          of  (shuttering)
 
Tongue I gave you          (saying)
I is the truth you ease          with release
 
Originally published in Denver Quarterly. 
Other poems in the book have been published as the winner of the Boston Review and Five Fingers Review poetry contests, and in such publications as Eoagh, New American Writing, and Word For/Word.
 
Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute, we understand. Help us, though, by spreading the word to your friends, sharing on Facebook, etc.
 
If you run a reading series, please consider inviting Tod. He'd probably love to read for you and yours. Contact him here or through the Vitreous Hide Facebook page.
 
Consider reviewing Vitreous Hide. Please contact Lavender Ink for review copies.
 
Please also consider adopting the book for your creative writing, poetics, forms and craft or literature course. Vitreous Hide provides a great entry point into productive discussions of queer poetry and poetics, field composition and formal experimentation, "postmodern" poetry and poetics, and modes of the contemporary lyric.

story:
Members of Congress are starved for perspectives from outside the beltway bubble...perspectives such as those offered by the "salt of the earth" heroes I profile in my book The Heart Has Reasons: Dutch Rescuers of Jewish Children during the Holocaust.

I've been invited to address members of Congress next month on Holocaust Remembrance Day (April 19). In my book about Holocaust rescuers, these ordinary yet extraordinary people make a strong and moving case that to care for and protect society's most vulnerable is "just the human thing to do." Another message that comes through loud and clear is that war is really and truly a last resort because it is really and truly hell.

The reality of our political system is that there are an average of two full-time lobbyists for every member of Congress. Every day our legislators are fed the views of Big Pharma, Chamber of Commerce, AMA, Big Oil, etc. and  special interest lobbies like AIPAC and the NRA. It is not an exaggeration to say they are stuffed with information from these channels.

The views of the Holocaust rescuers are strikingly different. Consider the following quotes from The Heart Has Reasons:

"Recently I was asked to speak at a college in Israel. In the audience there were both Jewish and Arab students, and at the end an Arab boy raised his hand and asked,“Would you have helped my people if they were in trouble?” And I told him that at that time it was the Jews who needed the help. If it had been another group, I think I would have helped them also. You can’t let people be treated in an inhuman way around you. Otherwise you start to become inhuman."—Hetty Voute, pg. 59, took Jewish children to hiding places on her bicycle.

"Who cares about what is good for the people?  The soldiers go and fight, but it’s all about what’s in the land—oil or uranium.  There is so much fighting and it costs so much money, but all the while the children had nothing to eat.  Whenever there’s a war, it it’s always the children who have to suffer." —Clara Dijkstra, page 97, cared for a Jewish baby as her own for four years.

"Our leaders, especially, need to be motivated by love, not hate.  And I don’t mean love of money. They should take to heart Gandhi’s advice: he said to recall the face of the poorest and most helpless person you’ve ever met, and then ask yourself if the step you are contemplating will be of any use to him." —Ted Leenders, pg 189, saved dozens of Jewish children.

You can help!

I am making the trip to Washington entirely at my own expense. Because of anti-corruption laws, I won’t receive a speaker's fee for addressing Congress. That same law also prevents me from selling copies of The Heart Has Reasons at the event. I can only give them away as gifts.

In my presentation, Bottom Up Bravery: Learning from the Holocaust Rescuers, I will only be able to skim the surface of the rescuers' worldview and wisdom.  And so, what I'd like to do is give each legislator a copy of The Heart Has Reasons. But, because at least 50 members of Congress are expected to attend, I'll need a little financial help to pull that off. A contribution of $15 will literally put the words of the Holocaust rescuers into the hands of one of our lawmakers. Please help me to make this happen!

story:
Who's THIS guy?

My name is Michael Coorlim, and I'm a writer of steampunk fiction. I don't make a lot of money at it, but I earn enough to pay the bills most of the time, which is a good thing because temp and freelancing gigs have been hard to find the last few years. You know how it is.

What does HE want?

My laptop has been on its last legs for awhile now: laggy as hell, requiring a startup repair every time, making unpleasant noises whenever it's turned on. My girlfriend tells me that it was getting harder and harder to tell us apart.

Suddenly it stopped working, and that's where we differ. I still need to work, and for me working is writing. Without a laptop, I can't write. As I've found in the past that homelessness isn't as glamouous as it seems, I decided that it would be best to get a replacement. 

It turns out that the people who sell laptops want money, not debts, and I only have the latter. That's where you come in.

What I need

I need a laptop capable of running a word processor (OpenOffice), Scrivener, an image manipulation program (Gimp), and connecting to the internet so I can upload my work. A 15" screen is the minimum I need to make covers in, and it needs a gig or two of RAM to keep everything running smoothly with whatever bloaty Windows OS I end up with.

IndieGoGo sets a minimum funding goal of $500, so that's what I'm asking for. If I get more I'll spend more money comissioning art from local artists for covers and interior illustrations.

Rewards

Give unto me and thou shalt be rewarded.

For the minimum $5 donation, you'll get an acknowledgement on my blog and facebook page.

$25 gets you an acknowledgement and an e-copy of "The Collected Bartleby and James Adventures," a collection of four steampunk mystery novelettes, in .pdf, .mobi, and .epub. You will also be mailed a fetching signed bartleby and james bookmark.

$50 gets you the above and an advance e-copy of "Chronicles of a Gentlewoman," a collection of four steampunk thriller novelettes, written on the very laptop you've helped to fund.

$100 gets you the above, and you'll also be given a signed advance physical copy of the paperback collection of all eight novelettes. At this point and beyond, donators will be given acknowledgement in the paperback's front materials.

$500 and you've basically bought me my laptop. Thanks! In addition to all of the above, I'll name a character in some upcoming work after you. The character will play a significant role and then die heroically, saving the day. Maybe he or she will be eaten by a bear! Or blown up by the Kaiser, wouldn't that be something!

 

Can't afford it? No problem.

If you want to give me a hand but can't afford to send real money, you can help by reposting/retweeting the campaign using the Indiegogo share tools.

story:
My niece was viciously attacked by a large dog recently. Her face was ripped apart and she is suffering from nerve damage as well as many other problems. She has partial paralisys in her face.

As a family we have pooled all the money we can muster up including going in deep credit card debt to help get her the best care possible. 

So far we have been able to pay for all the medical care but have reached the breaking point and cannot afford her next surgery which is to hopefully fix the nerve damage. The surgery is scheduled and now we just need the money. We have some but as you can see we are way short of the amount needed. As we raise more money ourselves we will lower the amount we are asking for. I am currently applying for a loan to cover this but just thought I would see if there was a way we coould get some help.

We are a close family and have never asked for anything but have given much. This is our first time on the 'asking' side and it's a hard position to be in. If you feel you can't do anything financially please pray for her. That's all we can ask.

Thank you for reading.

story:
Our Story

Free Patriot Press is an independent alternative media / publishing company, founded by Darryl W. Perry in June 2009, with the mission of “ensuring a FREE PRESS for the FREEDOM MOVEMENT” and to also give new authors an avenue for publishing freedom oriented material.
FPP welcomes any author committed to the Freedom Movement.

FPP publishes both original content books and reprints of public domain material. Original content books published by FPP have won awards from Freedom Book Club & LAVA.

The Impact

As a small publishing company, one of the hindrances to publishing is the need for International Standard Book Numbers (ISBN). Free Patriot Press needs to purchase a new batch of ISBN's:
100 ISBN's costs $600 (should last 8-10 years - based on current estimates of books to be published per year)
1000 ISBN's costs $1000 (should last 50 years - based on current estimates of books to be published per year)

What We Need & What You Get

Advertise your liberty-oriented business or organization in books for as little as $1 per title.

All donors will be credited (on the tile page) as sponsoring a future title, to be published by FPP, and given the option to display an advertisement in the back of the title bearing the credit.

Large donors will be given first choice of titles to display advertising.

Additionally, all donors will receive 1 free copy of the book displaying their credit.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word on facebook and twitter.
To further encourage people to spread the word of the fund raiser, FPP will upgrade those who refer donors! When your referrals donate money, you will get credit (dollar-for-dollar) towards an upgrade. If your referrals donate over $54; you will be credited as a GOLD sponsor! Login to Indiegogo (or sign-up; it's free) and spread the word!
